reviewText: I cannot say enough good about the Wild Kratts.  We love the show.  I frequently watch with the boys and they learn so much about some pretty random animals.  But they have a very fact based show mixed with enough imagination to keep the boys interested in watching them over and over again.  My son has often come to me telling me about one that I may have missed while doing other house hold chores.  I am glad to have something more educational and less crass than say spongebob to put on for my boys.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Bought as a gift for my granddaughter. I have heard she has watched this several times and loves it. She's a fan of the Kratt brothers from PBS.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My boys (3 and 13 months) love the Kratt brothers. If you haven't seen the show on PBS it's about 2 brothers  who have special suites that can transform them into the animals they love. It's incredibly educational in that you learn a ton about animals you may already know something about, and you learn a TON about animals you've never heard of before. Even I love watching along, which is really nice since I'm usually always at the mercy of what `they' want to watch. Therefore, thank goodness for the Kratt Brothers!
Title: N/A

reviewText: My son loves to watch and learn anything about animals and this DVD is great! He laughs and learns while watching these dvd's! Great buy for entertaining your child! We have others of these and they are all good.
